generatedTitle: The Recent World Series History of the Los Angeles Dodgers

extractFactDictList.question: When was the last time the Los Angeles Dodgers won the World Series?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In fact, the last time the Dodgers won the World Series was in 1988, when they defeated the Oakland Athletics in a thrilling five-game series.

extractFactDictList.question: Who did the Los Angeles Dodgers lose to in the 2017 World Series?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In 2017, the team made it to the World Series but lost to the Houston Astros in seven games.

extractFactDictList.question: How many games did the Boston Red Sox win in the 2018 World Series?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In 2018, the Dodgers again made it to the World Series but were defeated by the Boston Red Sox in five games.

extractFactDictList.question: What has contributed to the Los Angeles Dodgers' success?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Dodgers have a strong roster and a dedicated fan base.
extractFactDictList.phrase: Strong roster and dedicated fan base

extractFactDictList.question: How many times have the Los Angeles Dodgers made it to the World Series since 1988?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Dodgers have made it to the World Series three times since then, but have lost each time.
